com.basho.riak.client.api.commands.indexes

Class BucketIndexQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basho.riak.client.api.RiakCommand<S,U>
      • com.basho.riak.client.api.commands.indexes.SecondaryIndexQuery<String,BinIndexQuery.Response,BinIndexQuery>
        • com.basho.riak.client.api.commands.indexes.BinIndexQuery
          • com.basho.riak.client.api.commands.indexes.BucketIndexQuery

  • public class BucketIndexQuery
extends BinIndexQuery
    Performs a 2i query across the special $bucket index, for a known bucket, and returns the keys in that bucket.

    A BucketIndexQuery is used when you want to fetch all the keys for a bucket. Only a namespace is needed. 

     Namespace ns = new Namespace("my_type", "my_bucket");
 BucketIndexQuery q = new BucketIndexQuery.Builder(ns).build();
 RawIndexquery.Response resp = client.execute(q);
    Since:
    2.0.7
    Author:
    Alex Moore
